duties_responsibilities.duty: Review commercial loans secured by real estate and non-real estate collateral prior to origination, renewal, or modification.
Ensure that the bank's loan policy and procedures are followed and work closely with lenders and lending assistants to ensure timely and compliant loan closings.
Perform loan package reviews to determine the bank's lien position for a variety of collateral types, both Real Estate and Non-Real Estate.
Review entity documentation to ensure proper certification to do business and determine authorized signers for the entity.
Apply general knowledge of Federal Regulations to assist the bank in following various compliance requirements.
Be a problem solver by applying written loan policy and procedures to each task.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma and experience in loan documentation review and application of bank's policies and procedures
